mapper.sql: CFId, LId, CId, PId, WId, ClaId, CCId, CFMoveP, CFPhoneNum, CFEMail, CFComponentName, CFComponentId, CFComponentNum, CFCheckNum, CFRemark, CFStatus, CFUrgentStatus, CFRemarkFile, CFReportFile,CFTime,CFReply,CFReplyReport
mapper.select:
SELECT cf.CFId,cf.CFMoveP,cf.CFPhoneNum,cf.CFEMail,cf.CFComponentName,cf.CFComponentId,cf.CFComponentNum, cf.CFCheckNum,cf.CFRemark,cf.CFStatus,cf.CFUrgentStatus,cf.CFReportFile,cf.CFTime,cf.CFReply, cf.CFReplyReport,LName,c.CName CName,PName,cla.CName ClaName,cc.CCName CCName, npe.NPENotifyEmail
,wh.WId,WStatus
,ur.UFName UFName
FROM checkingform cf,line l,cell c,project p,classify cla,checkingclassify cc, notifypersonnelemail npe
,warehouse wh
,urgentfile ur
WHERE cf.LId=l.LId AND cf.CFId=#{cfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cf.CFId=npe.CFId AND c.CId=cf.CId AND p.PId=cf.PId AND cla.ClaId=cf.ClaId AND cc.CCId=cf.CCId
AND wh.WId=cf.WId
AND ur.CFId=cf.CFId
SELECT MAX(CFId) FROM checkingform WHERE CFId LIKE '${value}';
mapper.insert: insert into checkingform (CFId, LId, CId, PId, WId, ClaId, CCId, CFMoveP, CFPhoneNum, CFEMail, CFComponentName, CFComponentId, CFComponentNum, CFCheckNum, CFRemark, CFStatus, CFUrgentStatus, CFRemarkFile, CFReportFile,CFTime,CFReply,CFReplyReport ) values (#{cfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ccid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cfmovep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfphonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfcomponentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfcomponentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfcomponentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cfchecknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cfremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cfurgentstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cfremarkfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfreportfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{cfreply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cfreplyreport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update checkingform
LId = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CId = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PId = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WId = #{wid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClaId = #{claid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CCId = #{ccid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CFMoveP = #{cfmovep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFPhoneNum = #{cfphonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFEMail = #{cfemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFComponentName = #{cfcomponentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFComponentId = #{cfcomponentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFComponentNum = #{cfcomponentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CFCheckNum = #{cfchecknum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CFRemark = #{cfremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFStatus = #{cfstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CFUrgentStatus = #{cfurgentstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CFRemarkFile = #{cfremarkfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFReportFile = #{cfreportfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFTime = #{cftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CFReply = #{cfreply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFReplyreport = #{cfreplyreport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CFId = #{cfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update checkingform set LId = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CId = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PId = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WId = #{wid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClaId = #{claid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CCId = #{ccid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CFMoveP = #{cfmovep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFPhoneNum = #{cfphonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFEMail = #{cfemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFComponentName = #{cfcomponentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFComponentId = #{cfcomponentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFComponentNum = #{cfcomponentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CFCheckNum = #{cfchecknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CFRemark = #{cfremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFStatus = #{cfstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CFUrgentStatus = #{cfurgentstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CFRemarkFile = #{cfremarkfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFReportFile = #{cfreportfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CFTime = #{cftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} CFReply=#{cfreply,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CFReplyreport=#{cfreplyreport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CFId = #{cfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
